entry.title: Blowup algebras of determinantal ideals in prime characteristic
entry.summary: We study $F$-purity and strong $F$-regularity of blowup algebras. Our main focus is on algebras given by symbolic and ordinary powers of ideals of minors of a generic matrix, a symmetric matrix, and a Hankel matrix. We also study ideals of Pfaffians of a skew-symmetric matrix. We use these results to obtain bounds on the degrees of the defining equations for these algebras. We also prove that the limit of the normalized regularity of the symbolic powers of these ideals exists and that their depth stabilizes. Finally, we show that, for determinantal ideals, there exists a monomial order for which taking initial ideals commutes with taking symbolic powers. To obtain these results we develop the notion of $F$-pure filtrations and symbolic $F$-purity.
entry.arxiv:comment: This preprint corrects, replaces, and expands the work done in preprint arXiv:2004.03831, which contains a mistake Lemma 5.4
